text: Britain is the first country in the world to approve the Pfizer-BioNTech #Covid19 vaccine for use and doses are being shipped from Belgium. Here's a look at how the #vaccine will make its way from the production plant to hospitals. https://t.co/adWWvwEH9U https://t.co/Sbt3MClZMU https://t.co/srfasL3waX
